summary: Highly experienced Estimator with over 15 years in infrastructure and civil projects, specializing in optimizing project budgets. Achieved annual savings of $1.5M USD through process improvements.

bullets.text: Provided in-depth analysis of tendering documents and conducted first principle estimating for comprehensive project budgeting and cost optimization.
Prepared detailed Bill of Quantities (BOQ) and tender documents for diverse construction projects, achieving a reduction in tendering errors.
Developed commercial offers and facilitated quantity take-offs for civil projects, encompassing foundations, architectural, structural, and interior design elements.
Requested quotes from suppliers, including MEP installations, optimizing procurement and reducing total material costs.
Assessed additional costs of design variations and prepared final detailed BOQ and accounts for financial credibility.
Managed documentation for approval and regulation of residential building projects, ensuring compliance with standards.
Led estimation processes for significant projects such as LDS Temple complexes and Cultura Inglesa schools, managing substantial contract values.
Conducted thorough tender analysis and prepared preliminary budgets for complex infrastructure projects by analyzing draft drawings and leveraging experience in tender opening committees.
metrics: Optimized initial budgets, achieving up to 22% accuracy improvement

bullets.text: Developed comprehensive BOQs encompassing materials, labor, and equipment, improving cost estimation accuracy and project execution efficiency.
Managed cost consulting with suppliers and evaluated design variations for financial impacts, maintaining budget adherence and financial transparency.
Prepared final detailed BOQs and accounts for awarded projects, ensuring precise financial tracking and accountability.
Increased scope clarification meetings with contractors, enhancing constructability and aligning stakeholder expectations.
Analyzed tender documents, executed precision quantity take-offs, and drafted contractual BOQs for complex construction projects.
Managed project cost estimates and consulting, optimizing supplier negotiations for significant cost reductions.
Coordinated between site and management teams to integrate awarded project requirements, ensuring smooth project execution.
metrics: Facilitated seamless integration for 5 major projects

bullets.text: Conducted quantity take-offs and prepared BOQs for residential projects, facilitating budget feasibility studies and bank financing documentation.
Executed feasibility cost studies for preliminary designs, providing accurate budgeting and cost estimation for large-scale construction projects.
metrics: Completed feasibility studies for an 196,174 sq ft project

bullets.text: Assessed and estimated additional design variation costs during construction phases, aligning financial forecasts and project budgets.
metrics: Managed cost variations for projects over 242,190 sq ft

bullets.text: Conducted comprehensive cost and quantity evaluations for architectural and engineering projects, optimizing project bids.

education.additionalInfo: CAU BR - Brazilian Council of Architecture and Urbanism

additionalExperience: Member of AIQS as of December 2023. Completed specializations in Autodesk Revit Architecture, MEP, and Navisworks Manage at CADRITECH.
